contentencoded:
New federal contractors are getting a new wage in the new year: $10.10 per hour.

Analysts say the biggest impact as being mostly regional, in cheaper parts of the country.

Click the media player above to hear more.
teaser: Raise to $10.10 per hour was promised in last year's State of the Union.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday January 1, 2015
description: Raise to $10.10 per hour was promised in last year's State of the Union.
title: Wage rises for new federal contractors
